Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
BkmxAppCommonApplication functions that are needed by both the Main App and the Worker
BkmxAppDel(Labels)A category on BkmxAppDel that provides methods which elements in the GUI need for binding
BkmxOutlineViewAdds some fairly generic features to NSOutlineView
BookshelfBookMacster's default Document. A "Bookshelf" is a place for storing bookmarks in a given configuration
Bookshelf(Actions)A category of IBAction methods.  Most of those which involve the stark Selection invoke StarkEditor class methods to do the actual work.  Most of the Maintain methods invoke other methods in Bookshelf.m to do the actual work
Bookshelf(ActionValidator)
Bookshelf(GuiStuff)A category on Bookshelf that provides methods which are only used in the GUI, in particular many key paths for binding to
BookshelfWC(Delegations)BookshelfWC is the delegate for itself and also a number of the views in it.  I decided it would be neat to put all the delegate methods into their own category
BookshigA managed object which stores the configuration settings of a Bookshelf The name is a contraction of "Bookshelf Configuration"
BrowfileA managed object which knows static information about an OwnerApp and its exformat.  To avoid duplication, a browfile can only be obtained using one of the Browfiler class methods.  For the same reason, an extore can only be obtained from one of the browfile instance methods.  Thus, an extore must always have a browfile
BrowfileChoiceA thin wrapper around a browfile, or a placeholder which allows users to choose "Other Mac Account" or "Choose File" instead of an existing browfile
BrowfilerA class for fetching Browfiles from and inserting Browfiles into the application-wide in-memory managed object context.  To avoid duplication, a Browfile must be obtained using one of these class methods
BrowidA class which has instance variables required to canonically and uniquely identify a Browfile
DeliciousParserProvides a class method for parsing data downloaded from del.icio.us API posts/all requests into the localMoc of a given extore
DupesterAn SSYMojo which is initialized with entity Dupe_entity
ExtoreReads/Writes bookmarks from/to an external store
IxternalizerA managed object which stores settings and knows how to do the Sync In or Sync Out for a single Browfile
LegacyBrowfileIdentifiersA class which converts legacy browfileIdentifier strings into equivalent Browid objects
NSData(Base64Minus)Codec for a modified base64 encoding which uses "-" character is used in its alphabet instead of the "/"
NSMenu(StarkContextual)An NSMenu helper which can add contextual menu items for a Stark context, or return an entire prefabricated menu containing all avalailable items
NSMutableDictionary(KeyPaths)NSMutableDictionary can read values from nested dictionaries with -[NSObject valueForKeyPath:], but not set such values.  This category adds the missing setValue:forKeyPath: method, and methods to mutate arrays located down key paths.  Each method also has a companion which takes a "key path array", which is a an array of string keys, instead of a key path, which is an equivalent dot-separated string
NSNumber(CommandArgumentDisplay)Category for transforming a Command argument to a human-readable name
NSNumber(DelimiterDisplay)Category for transforming a delimiter character value into a human-readable expression
NSNumber(Sharype)Category for wrapping Sharype values as NSNumber objects
NSNumber(SharypeCoarseDisplay)Category for transforming a Sharype Coarseto a human-readable name
NSNumber(SharypeDisplay)Category for transforming a Sharype to a human-readable name
NSNumber(SortableDisplay)Category for transforming a BkmxSortable value to a human-readable name
NSNumber(TrigTypeDisplay)Category for transforming a Trigger type to a human-readable name
NSNumber(VerifierDispositionDisplay)Category for transforming a BkmxFixDispo to a human-readable name
NSNumber(VerifierSubtype302Display)Category for transforming a BkmxHttp302 to a human-readable name
NSObject(StarkMenuDataSource)
NSObject(TrigDetailDisplay)Category for transforming an object which is either a Browfile or a SSYRecurringDate to a human-readable display name or day name
NSString(MethodDisplay)Used in the Bookshelf nib file.  Transforms the 'method' instance variable of a Command object to human readable
NSString(VisitorDisplay)Used in the Bookshelf nib file.  Transforms the 'visitor' instance variable of a Stark or Bookshig object to human readable
NSUserDefaults(GoogleLogin)Gets and sets value for key constKeyCurrentlyLoggedInGoogleAccountEmail, ^but^ syncs immediately
QuatcherA Quit Watcher.  Will watch quatches (quit watches) and, when an app specified by a quatch quits, will launch a worker tool with the argument specified in the quatch
StarkA Stored Bookmark Managed Object
Stark(Attributability)A category which answers questions about attribute capability for a Stark
StarkerInstantiated with a managed object context with Starks in it, Starker can do many of the common manipulations you need done on those Starks
< Startainer >Formal protocol for an object which can contain Starks in a managed object context, and has a Starker available
TransformStringsArrayToDataTransforms an array of strings by concatenating them into an NSData separated by NULL delimiters
TransformStringsArrayToNullDelimitedTransforms an array of strings to a string of strings separated by NULL delimiters
TransformStringsSetToDataTransforms an set of strings by concatenating them into an NSData separated by NULL delimiters
TransformStringsSetToNullDelimitedTransforms an set of strings to a string of strings separated by NULL delimiters
VerifySinceControllerWindow controller subclass for the sheet which asks user which bookmarks -- since last when verified -- to verify
youAccessors generated dynamically by Core Data for Stark managed objects
